CBackend¶

The C module contains two writers, CWriter and OmpWriter, which produces C and OpenMP code

Note

This backend is widely used on llCoMP.

class Backends.C.Writers.CWriter.CWriter(filename=None, stream=None)¶

A visitor which translates the IR to plain C code

generic_visit_nodeList(nodeList, separator, offset)¶
Visit a list of nodes , writing values within a separator
class Backends.C.Writers.OmpWriter.OmpWriter(filename=None, stream=None)¶
Visitor which translates the IR to C/OpenMP.
